Class EquatorialCoordinate

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.astronomy.coordinates.EquatorialCoordinate
public class EquatorialCoordinate extends Object
Equatorial celestial coordinates (Right Ascension and Declination). RA is measured in hours (0-24h) or degrees (0-360°) along celestial equator. Dec is measured in degrees (-90° to +90°) from celestial equator. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
